programme.title: Space: The New Frontier: The Dark Side
programme.desc: In terms of the Universe, we know we don't know much, especially when it comes to dark matter and dark energy. Scientists are devoting so much of their time to discovering as much as the possibly can about this mysterious matter.

programme.title: Armstrong

programme.title: Se7en

programme.title: Snatch

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: En ausencia de Gabriela, Pepa le lleva mariachis a Martín, las Elizondo y los Reyes se unen a la fiesta. Benito defiende su honra ante su familia y los Rosales, surge un compromiso.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan sufre un atentado a tiros cuando lleva a las Elizondo a la hacienda en el vehículo de Franco, Jimena resulta herida, Gabriela lo presiente y llama por teléfono, pero Martín le miente.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Jimena es atendida en el hospital luego del atentado, del que Dínora es la sospechosa, al tiempo que alguien vigila en la sombra a los Reyes. Leonidas discute con Ruth y Eva la defiende.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan sufre otro atentado en la hacienda de las Elizondo y se inicia una persecución, Fernando y Gabriela riñen y él le muestra su verdadera personalidad, Óscar busca mudarse con Jimena.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Sara y Norma se enfrentan a balazos con los pistoleros que acorralan a Juan, la policía encuentra algunas pistas. Fernando comienza a manipular en contra de sus hijas a una sumisa Gabriela.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Gabriela y Fernando llegan de la luna de miel cuando Pepa le prepara una divertida bienvenida a Jimena, Fernando anuncia nuevas reglas. La policía captura a varios sospechosos de los atentados.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Las Elizondo les explican a los Reyes que se quedan en la hacienda ante el peligro que se cierne sobre Gabriela. Fernando contrata como mayordomos a dos antiguos enemigos de los Reyes.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Leonidas vuelve a ofender a Ruth y Juan la defiende, pero Óscar impide que su hermano lo golpee porque es el médico que atendió a Jimena, Leonidas pide perdón, Eva encara a Raquel sobre Ruth.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Las Elizondo desconfían de Malcolm y Carmela, los nuevos empleados de Fernando, porque eran los antiguos mayordomos de Eduvina. Martín defiende a Dominga de las arbitrariedades de Carmela.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Martín insulta a Carmela, ella y Malcolm se dan cuenta de que el abuelo es un obstáculo en su camino, Norma trata de abrirle los ojos a Gabriela. Rosario visita la hacienda y se pelea con Sara.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Un nuevo pistolero intenta asesinar a Juan, Óscar reconoce el carro y lo siguen hasta la hacienda de Gabriela, donde se produce un enfrentamiento, Fernando encubre al autor de los ataques.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Hombres armados custodian la hacienda de los Reyes día y noche. Carmela sigue su plan y finge un desmayo para que despidan a Dominga, por quien surge una guerra entre Martín y Fernando.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: A pesar de la vigilancia, Dínora entra en la hacienda de los Reyes y le dispara a Juan, quien la denuncia. Dominga comienza a trabajar con los Reyes, se avecinan nuevos problemas amorosos.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Gabriela desautoriza a Malcolm en el manejo de las pesebreras y reduce sus atribuciones, las Elizondo ganan terreno en la hacienda. Norma presiente que alguien las vigila en la oscuridad.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Wednesday befriends a new boy her age, Robespierre Courtney, Morticia invites his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Henry Courtney to visit the Addams house for tea. Unbeknownst to them, the Courtney's are hoping to meet a number of the social set.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: There is a neighborhood burglar on the loose, and Morticia has reason to believe it could be Gomez. Morticia decides to probe his subconscious mind for a key to his criminality after she and Uncle Fester discover loot hidden in the storeroom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's pet plant Cleopatra gobbles up her favorite photo of Gomez from the family album. When the original photographer is found and asked to make a duplicate picture, it is discovered that he is now with the Department of Motor Vehicles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez plays host to Don Xavier Molines, a family friend during his childhood in Spain, and his daughter Consuella. Morticia's hospitality is put to the test when Consuella reveals that she has been promised in marriage to Gomez since childhood.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Wednesday's and Pugsley's faith in Santa Claus is shaken, Uncle Fester is chosen to back up Santa in case the real St. Nick is too busy to come. However, Fester-Santa gets stuck in the chimney, so each of the other adults fills in for him.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Fester is so smitten upon receipt of a photo of his love, a bearded carnival lady, that he borrows stamp money to mail her a proposal. Morticia dons a beard and poses as the mother to convince Fester that he will have to work to support a wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez see Fester conferring with TV muscleman Jack LaGrann (Jack LaLanne), and think that Fester is planning a television career. However, Uncle Fester confides to Lurch that he has to go on a secret diet and exercise.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez find Grandfather Pegleg's treasure map and summon Captain Grimby. They hope to charter his boat for the treasure hunt. But after meeting the Captain, Morticia is careful to keep the nature of the mission secret.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia Frump is madly in love with Horatio Bartholomew, the man who has everything, except the truth about her relatives. Morticia, not convinced by Bartholomew, persuades playboy Cousin Itt to stir the embers of his past romance with Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandma Frump (guest star Margaret Hamilton), comes to the mistaken conclusion that her daughter, Morticia (Carolyn Jones), and Gomez (John Astin) plan to pack her off to an old folks home. Actually, they plan to send her to a beauty farm.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia, in order to be part of the National Beautification Program, decides to become a home decorator and offers her services to the neighbors. Next door neighbor, and insurance agent, Joe Digby hires Morticia in hopes of selling them insurance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia taunts Uncle Fester into announcing that he is going to join the Peace Corps. Fester feels he's a cinch to be accepted because Gomez plans to pull strings in Washington on his behalf. The entire family agrees to help him study for the exam.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Allyn Joslyn guest-stars as Sam Hilliard, a former truant officer who now heads a private school where Wednesday and Pugsley are enrolled. When Hilliard breaks under the strain of dealing with the Addams children, Gomez buys the school.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dr. Marvin P. Gunderson is summoned to examine Kitty Kat, the ailing lion pet of the Addams Family. Morticia decides that it is the doctor who needs help. To build his confidence, human members of the family pretend to be ill so he can effect cures.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's concern that Lurch is overworked leads Gomez to the operating table to assemble a custom-built secondary butler. Lurch lets the robot do all the work and then begins to feel that he isn't needed anymore.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Uncle Fester incinerates the family's stuffed bear with his flamethrower, Morticia reports the accident to the insurance company. Mr. Henson the head of the company, sends his assistant, Mr. Digby, to handle the case.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch suffers from unrequited love over Tiny Trivia (guest star Diane Jergens), Morticia's visiting school chum who only has eyes for show business. The entire family decides to try to turn their stolid butler into a new personality.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Ophelia laments that she has been jilted, Morticia suggests a career as an alternative to marriage. She tries chemistry first (with explosive results) then turns to operatic singing. Cousin Itt is summoned to coach her to stardom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez decide to keep Wednesday and Pugsley home from school after Morticia sees the fairy tales they have to read. When the truant officer comes to investigate, he is shocked at what he finds.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Anytime, anywhere, people disappear – kidnapped from their daily routines. Predators always leave clues behind, but chasing them takes time, hampering investigators' attempts to solve these fatal abductions.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In Columbus, Ohio, a woman is found shot in the head. The death is ruled a suicide, but something is not right and detectives refuse to let the matter rest.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When killers are driven by jealousy and desire, their desperation is evident in both the crime and their efforts to avoid detection. But forensic science can reveal even the slightest mistake to solve crimes of passion.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Hairs and Fibers: The tiniest filament can become a mark of distinction in the most singular and intimate of ways. Investigators have come to rely on forensic evidence as fine as a carpet fiber or as innocent as an eyelash to crack difficult cases.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For serial killers, once is never enough. For investigators, the challenge is steep when the killers murder by numbers.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For a price, anything's possible. Contract killings arose out of the need to establish the perfect alibi. By hiring someone else to do the dirty work, a person can deflect guilt, at least in theory.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Using science as their most powerful weapon, investigators must find these hired killers and make them pay the true price of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some killers choose to hide their victims – And investigators must then rely on forensic examiners to uncover proof of murder – These are just two extraordinary crimes that have made their way into the medical examiner's casebook.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For homicide investigators, it's a race against time as they track their deadliest foe: a serial killer for whom killing is the only way to feel alive.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A friendly Midwest lodge becomes the scene of a gruesome double murder. Two men are dead and a safe filled with cash is missing.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A woman is found dead at the bottom of the basement stairs. As detectives look into the accident, they begin to question the sequence of events.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Terrorism: Thanks to new technology and, perhaps, the approaching millennium, terrorism is a growing international threat. The Oklahoma City explosion and the bombing of the World Trade Center are just two of the incidents of this growing problem.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A teenager is abducted on a shopping trip. Two hikers disappear from the Appalachian Trail.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes the scales of justice are balanced by just a few milligrams of evidence – a couple of fibers, a tooth filling, or a smudge on a piece of tape. The biggest cases are often solved by the smallest clues.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A lively old lady arrives in town hot on the trail of a notorious bandit and the reward money for capturing him.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A doctor seeks revenge on the man he blames for ruining his practice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas unmasks a killer posing as a door-to-door seed salesman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Marshall Torrance run into trouble while transporting a captured killer back to face trial.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A deathbed request from an old friend sends Lucas to a neighboring town in search of the man's long-lost sweetheart.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when a young man, eerily similar to a man he killed in the Civil War, challenges him to a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas agrees to take a job as an undercover agent and goes to investigate rumors of the sales of arms to renegade Indians. His life is endangered by the town drunk who stumbles onto his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While Lucas is in Wyoming on the trail of a gang illegally selling weapons to the Indians, Mark stays with Miss Milly, where he suffers from loneliness and doubt with his father gone for 2 months.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas looks for answers when recovering alcoholic Micah Torrence returns to the bottle and turns in his badge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: In a ghost town, Lucas, Mark and Micah tangle with the Newman family and learn the secret of the town's 20-year-old mystery of a lost gold mine.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Blinded in an explosion, Lucas fights despair as he prepares for a meeting with a gun-toting enemy.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A deranged ex-prisoner of war, cruelly abused in a Northern army prison, captures Lucas, locks him in a cage and vows to make him suffer for his part in the Civil War.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A traveling salesman can't talk his way out of an assault charge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is threatened with hanging by a lynch party when some horses he has purchased in a neighboring town turn out to be stolen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A janitor-turned-gunfighter's reputation hangs on one lucky shot and a lot of gall. The handyman finds himself in trouble when he accidentally kills another gunfighter.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to get help when he is shot after witnessing a murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After being foreman of a jury that convicted an Apache, Lucas is marked for death. Now, he must discover who is behind the curse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas allows some snowed-in stagecoach passengers to stay with him until the roads are passable. Trouble brews when the whiskey salesman and gunfighter fall for the same woman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Two pranksters write away for a mail-order bride, using Lucas's name.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas recognizes Dr. Battle as an ex-gunslinger with whom he once fought. He helps with a dying man, but Lucas and the doctor have unresolved anger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A Chinese man and his son fight prejudice as they try to open a laundry in North Fork.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While Lucas and Mark are traveling across the Mexican desert they encounter a trio of Mexican bandits who demand payment to cross "their" desert.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark takes a job as a stable boy against his father's wishes.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and Milly are held hostage in her general store when two gunmen attempt a daring robbery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Two prison wagon drivers stop at the McCain ranch looking for whiskey. Lucas turns them down because they are escorting a murderer, to be hanged in Yuma.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark goes to work for Will Temple, a badly scarred, very mysterious rancher.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Corey Hazlett insists he's innocent of murder, despite Lucas's eyewitness testimony.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: On a hunting trip, Hyder Simpson and his dog Rip dive into a lake after a raccoon. When he gets home he finds that no one can see or hear him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Actor Rance McGrew makes TV Westerns for a living, but he's a lousy actor and a worse cowboy. Despite that, each week he "wins" against the bad guys. Finally, the bad guys have had enough and decide to teach McGrew a lesson.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The senior residents of Sunnyvale decide that the secret to youth is acting young, and in particular playing a childhood game called "kick-the-can."

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Fortune discovers that a piano he bought his wife for her birthday has magical properties - the music that it plays makes people reveal their true essence.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Jeff Myrtlebank comes back to life at his own funeral and soon begins to act very strangely...

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Kanamits, 9-foot tall aliens, arrive on Earth with one lofty goal: To Serve Man.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Awakened by the cries of their daughter Bettina, Chris and Ruth Miller enter her room to find that she has vanished - even though they still hear her crying for help. Chris' physicist friend Bill thinks she moved into another dimension.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Old Ben, who is able to transform himself into anything, tries to help a crippled little girl.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: David Gurney wakes up to find that no one - his wife, his co-workers, his best friend, not even his own mother knows him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An astronaut declares himself a god when his ship lands on a planet populated by people smaller than ants.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Oliver Crangle is a bitter, prejudiced man. Through unknown means, he intends to shrink every evil person in the world at four o'clock.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A loud-mouthed braggart's boasts attract the attention of some aliens.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An elderly couple visit the New Life Corporation, hoping to transport their personalities into youthful artificial bodies.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An alien who crash-lands into a remote mountain village stirs up the villagers' fears and animosity, but he befriends a little boy and gives him a mysterious present.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A ventriloquist is convinced that his dummy, Willie, is alive and evil. He makes plans for a new act with a new dummy: plans that Willie doesn't support!

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When a newlywed couple briefly returns to the groom's childhood home, the ties of the past prove too strong to resist.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A widower buys a robot grandmother for his three children.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Cavender, an angel trying to win his wings, tries to help down-on-her-luck Agnes, who has just been fired.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An elderly private school teacher wonders if his life has meant anything as he contemplates suicide on Christmas Eve and is reminded by former students that he has, indeed, had an impact on their lives.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A scientist creates an android that has the qualities which he feels he's lacking.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A US naval destroyer investigates a mysterious tapping sound coming from a sunken submarine.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A reporter finds himself trapped in a small town where the people have extraordinary powers.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Vollmer, a small-time neo-Nazi, takes advice from a shadowy benefactor on how to increase his followers.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group feels beaten after living life on the road, but must continue to trudge along in spite of the changes they have incurred.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After withstanding a spectacular storm, Rick and the others meet what appears to be a friendly person, but find themselves mistrustful.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group has a difficult time molding to a new lifestyle, forcing them to consider whether they can be the people they once were.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: As Rick and the others continue to acclimate to their new surroundings, they consider a return to normalcy.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: While trying to secure a new home, Rick and his group face challenges, and question the utopia they find themselves in.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: When life within the walls begins to mimic life outside, the group realizes that sheltered life may not be possible.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl finds trouble while on a run; Rick and the group feel like outsiders in Alexandria, where trouble approaches the gates.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and the others have a difficult time assimilating into Alexandria; a new threat arises that could bring the group closer together.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: When it appears that things are starting to normalize in the settlement, a new problem arises for the Alexandrians.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A small group, including Rick, runs into hurdles while trying to return to Alexandria, and some may not make it back.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Morgan recalls his travels from King County to Alexandria, where he encountered a solo survivor who taught him a new code to live by.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Dead City
programme.desc: Maggie finds Negan, and they travel to Manhattan; a marshal named Armstrong follows Negan; meeting a quiet young girl named Ginny.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Dead City
programme.desc: Maggie and Negan encounter native New Yorkers; Armstrong revisits a trauma; Ginny attempts to adapt to change.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Dead City
programme.desc: Dark instincts reveal themselves as Maggie and Negan form a strategy; Armstrong is tested; Ginny embarks on a daring journey.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Dead City
programme.desc: Maggie and Negan carry out an attack, but not everything unfolds according to plan; Ginny and Armstrong each make unexpected contact with others.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Dead City
programme.desc: Truths are unearthed and motives are revealed as Maggie, Negan and the others travel further into the city's depths.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Ahora que los caminantes han traspasado las barreras de Alexandría, Rick y los otros sobrevivientes deben seguir luchando para mantenerse a salvo e intentar no perder la esperanza.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo cree que estar en el lado de los vivos trae responsabilidades que van más allá de la supervivencia. Desde esta perspectiva, Rick comienza una lucha consigo mismo para preservar las huellas de lo que queda de humanidad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo de Rick acompaña a Jesus a su comunidad, La Cumbre. Allí, un residente intenta matar a Gregory, el líder, por órdenes de Negan. Maggie hace un pacto con Gregory: matarán a Negan a cambio de la mitad de las provisiones que guardan.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Un nuevo enemigo amenaza la paz en Alexandria y Rick y el grupo deciden que la única manera de vencerlo es combatir.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tras haber obtenido un éxito menor, algunos de los miembros del grupo han sido hechos prisioneros por sus nuevos enemigos y el resto de los supervivientes de Alexandria tendrá que tratar de liberarlos.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Abraham abandona a Eugene durante una misión porque él le dice que no necesita su protección. Daryl, Rosita y Denise se topan con un grupo de los Salvadores, dirigidos por Dwight, y entre los dos bandos se produce un tiroteo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol desaparece de Alexandria y toda la comunidad se coordina para localizarla. Sin embargo, lo que algunos de ellos encuentran no es lo que andaban buscando.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Para salvar a Maggie, que se encuentra enferma, el grupo de Rick se aventura fuera de los muros de Alexandria. Pero los hombres de Negan los están esperando en la carretera.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Se descubre contra quién ha ejecutado Negan su venganza. Después, lleva a Rick a hacer un viaje que este no olvidará jamás, con la intención de mostrarle hasta dónde llega su poder y cómo va a cambiar la vida de todos los protagonistas.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol y Morgan son conducidos hasta una comunidad que parece segura y bien abastecida. Todo resulta tan idílico, que la desconfianza ante lo que están presenciando aflora en ellos.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Negan mantiene a Daryl encerrado en una celda, pero le propone que se someta a él y pasará a disfrutar de los privilegios de los que gozan los suyos. Se descubre el pasado de Dwight y por qué tiene la cara desfigurada.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los miembros del grupo de Alexandria están desmoralizados debido a los trágicos acontecimientos que acaban de ocurrir, pero al mismo tiempo deben prepararse para el encuentro con Negan. Éste llega antes de lo previsto y les arrebata las armas.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Afligidas por la pena y rodeadas de enemigos, Maggie y Sasha tratan de encontrar seguridad en Hilltop, pero allí no son bien recibidas por todos. En ese momento, los hombres de Negan llegan a Hilltop, adonde también se dirigen Carl y Enid.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tara llega a un poblado en el que sólo viven unas peligrosas mujeres que no la dejarán salir de ahí fácilmente. Mientras tanto, Heath, quien la acompañaba en la búsqueda de provisiones, se pierde tratando de escapar de un ataque zombi.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: U.S. agent James T. West enlists in a secret army of fanatics whose demented leader is plotting to overthrow United States Army units stationed in the Southwest.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents James T. West and Artemus Gordon go after Dr. Cadwallader, demented geologist who is systematically devastating the state of Wyoming with man-made earthquakes.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Gov. Bradford and his secretary, Miss Piecemeal, watch as the governor's statue is unveiled during a private showing at the Bolt Museum. Suddenly, the statue blinks, and Bradford, immobilized by an injection, is taken prisoner.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: U.S. secret agent James T. West is lured into a hospital where he is gassed and carried out in a coffin by the weird, zombie-like aides of one Dr. Arcularis.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agent James T. West poses as a notorious desperado, Frank Slade, inaplan to arrest a Mexican bandit, Colonel Vasquez, who has been robbing banks in American border towns and then fleeing to the sanctuary of Mexico.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Iron Man Torres strangles a shop owner named Gilbert as secret agent James T. West passes by.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents James T. West and Artemus Gordon set out to crack a thriving opium-and-alien smuggling operation in San Francisco and become involved in struggle for control of Hunan Province, China.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agent James T. West is investigating the loss of government suppliers of kerosene and copper when his stagecoach is halted by a sheet of flame.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents James T. West and Artemus Gordon, assigned to protect a Middle Eastern despot from assassination, find their task complicated by the attitude of the degenerate tyrant, Emir El Emid.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents James T. West and Artemus Gordon help Governor Lewis keep the state of California solvent by seeing that a pledged $5,000,000 from each of three wealthy but disreputable personsis turned over to the governor.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Two U.S. Supreme Court Justices have died mysteriously but Justice Chaynedis misses secret agent James T. West's concern for his life.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agent James T. West poses as a Federal prison inspector and his side-kick, Artemus Gordon, pretends he is a preacher when the two are assigned to halt an organized outbreak of terror that has paralyzed a western community.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents James T. West and Artemus Gordon are assigned to protect South Seas island prince who insists on going to an exclusive health resort where assassins are waiting to kill him.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agent James T. West, probing the murder by fire of one of his former professors, Dr. Robey, a distinguished archaeologist, is ordered off the case at the request of U.S. Senator Hungerford.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The front door is stripped of paint. The HVAC system is connected and tested. Floating shelves are installed. The brick steps are repaired. An herb garden is planted, and the custom wallpaper is hung.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The 1890s Victorian house in Atlanta once owned by South Atlanta's first black postmaster was a dilapidated and abandoned structure. Now, it has been restored and the crew is back for a tour.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The crew is back in Massachusetts to start a new project—a modest 1902 Victorian in the town of Newburyport. They meet the homeowners, tour the project, and discuss the possible challenges.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The main power is disconnected, and temporary power is run before demo begins. Asbestos abatement is performed. The back bump out is removed. A carpenter talks about working with Parkinson's disease.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Work is underway for the new three-story bump out, the interior is demolished, and a new winder staircase is built. A retaining wall is built, and the town wastewater treatment facility is toured.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Shingles are installed on a small roof valley. Exterior windows are trimmed with a prefabricated trim system. The homeowners make design selections. The railing on the original staircase is raised.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Curb appeal is added to the front yard. A custom desk is built using off-the-shelf material. An electric vehicle charger is installed, and the secret to achieving a high gloss paint finish is shared.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Renovation on the 1902 house is done and the homeowners are ready to move in, but first, the crew and homeowners participate in the town's annual bed race. After, they meet at the house for a tour.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The crew takes on a first period home in the town of Ipswich, MA. A brief history on heating first period homes is given. The homeowners get a lesson on how to properly salvage the old floors.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The architect explains the architectural features of a first period gambrel and shares his plans for improvement. Demo starts in the ell. The town historian gives a tour of a 1717 first period home.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The house is supported while the foundation is demoed. A plan is devised to raise the timber frame in the ell. An old cistern is examined. Drainage issues are addressed. A book from 1826 is found.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The timber frame structure of the ell is disassembled to be rebuilt later. A clapboard manufacturer in Maine is visited. Fireplace designs are discussed. The homeowner considers a new house color.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: A fireplace is demoed; but the chimney is saved. Restoration of the timber frame begins. A sewer ejector is installed. The steel ridge beam for the new ell is prepped. Kevin goes clamming.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The old ell has been reassembled, and the new fireplace is constructed. A steel beam is craned into place to carry the weight of the roof in the new ell. The homeowner shops for a kitchen countertop.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The roof is insulated from the outside. Framing presents a challenge for running pipes. A lighting solution for the new ell is devised, and a lesson is given on how to properly waterproof a roof.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: HVAC ducts are hidden in the gambrel. A cinderblock enclosure is covered to mimic the old stone foundation. Damage to an original gunstock post is repaired. New clapboards are weaved into the old.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The project is halfway through construction. A water harvesting system is installed in the yard. The old barn is replaced with a new boathouse built in a factory and assembled onsite in one day.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: A granite water table is installed on the 1720 house. Original roof boards are installed on the ell ceiling. A fieldstone wall is built, and a young carpenter talks about his return to the trades.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Wide floorboards are installed to match the existing wood in the house. A sink is fabricated out of soapstone, and a backsplash is fabricated from an old board. Lighting installation wraps up.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: A little over a year ago, renovation began on the 1720 first period home. Restoration is now complete. Tremendous care went into preserving the home's history while making modern improvements.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The crew is renovating a home to be accessible for a young boy with muscular dystrophy.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Construction began on the Lexington project. A new energy code affects the construction.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: A concrete block wall is built to connect the new mechanical space out front to the old.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: A lally column is replaced by a larger ridge beam for an open kitchen and dining area.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Framing begins for a new zero-threshold sliding glass door. Geothermal is explained.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Geothermal pipes are run, wood blocking is installed, and receptacle boxes are replaced.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: The original brick is repaired. A ramp is built, and a modern accessible house is toured.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Special guest host Lucille Ball recalls how the trio first met, the wild predicaments of Jack Tripper, how the trio live together platonically, and how they survive each other. Guest Star(s): Lucille Ball

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: "The Best of Three's Company: Part 2." Guest Star(s): Lucille Ball

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Janet's dinner date with an important, but lecherous, man from the home office turns into a disaster when her "chaperone," Jack, gets drunk and falls asleep in her bed.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: When Terri breaks up with her ill-tempered boyfriend, he believes that Jack is the cause. Guest Star(s): Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Larry arranges a blind date for Jack - with a jewel thief who mistakes him for a fence.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Janet's date, a newspaper writer, offers to do a column on the trio's methods of coping with inflation. The published article, however, insinuates that their living arrangement is more intimate than practical.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack is conned into renting a small restaurant - only to discover that it's a run-down disaster. Guest Star(s): Jordan Charney

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Larry, who put the wrong date on the flyers announcing the opening of "Jack's Bistro," manages to "save" the day by inviting his Greek relatives.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack's attempted romance with Felipe's beautiful cousin, Maria, is plagued by problems - Janet, Terri, Maria's inability to speak English, and Maria's fiancé.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Janet is happy that her old friend, Randy, is dating Jack - until she discovers that Randy is married.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack hosts a Sunday brunch to convince the Reverend Gilmore that the Bistro is a respectable establishment. He succeeds until the newlywed couple at the next table begin their honeymoon. Guest Star(s): Earl Boen

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack is grateful for Larry's suggestion of a free guitarist as a business boost - until he finds out that he has a vocalist - Larry.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Furley discovers that the nice young man that Janet and Jack have fixed Terri up with is a convicted murderer.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Larry completely trusts Jack to show his teenage sister around town - until he discovers that they are still out at 2 a.m.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: By the time an innocent story is retold through several people, the trio believes Bob and Carol's marriage is on the rocks. Larry and Terri try to straighten things out with the couple - only to be "caught" by Mr. Furley.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: When the Bistro's building inspector demands a bribe from Jack, Janet suggests that they tape the next conversation for evidence. The recording the police hear, however, is of Furley telling Jack he has the pot (terrain) he wanted.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Terri is making plans for her wedding to a soap opera star - until Jack discovers that his sleazy reputation is well-earned.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack challenges a guy who has insulted Furley to a boxing match. His opponent, the girls learn, is a Golden Glove contender with 22 knockouts.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Furley helps Jack lose his "I can stay away for a week" bet with the girls.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack and Terri believe that Janet is trying to seduce Furley's shy nephew.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Instead of catching sleep in the dingy apartment above his restaurant, Jack catches Mr. Angelino with a young woman.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Terri falls for Jack when he buys a mustache which makes him look like her old boyfriend.

programme.title: Three's Company

programme.title: Randall Bailey vs Mike Jones

programme.title: Ray Mancini vs Orlando Romero

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: To track down the cheating tinhorn gambler Johnny Deuce and recover his money, Randall befriends the card sharp's protégé, a 12-year-old orphan boy and card cheat, nicknamed The Montana Kid.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh embarks on a mission of mercy when he pleads with the parents of a boy with appendicitis to let the doctor operate.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh reluctantly accepts an offbeat assignment: finding a beautiful bride for his bashful buddy Charlie, the homeliest and loneliest man in the West.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: The government employs Randall to portray an escaped prisoner in order to trick his cellmate into leading authorities to the $50,000 he stole and stashed away in a secret location.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall finds his prey in the hands of a lynch mob wiping out his bounty.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: An accused murderer who fears that he will be executed before he can be returned for trial, hires Paladin to make sure he gets there alive.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: When a mail-order bride from Philadelphia gets off the stagecoach in the middle of nowhere, Paladin decides to stay with her to make sure that she is safe.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin's new friend, stabbed by an assassin, makes a dying request to have his body taken back home to his hacienda in Mexico.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: A beggar who was once a circus performer bets a gambler that he can walk across the saloon on a tightrope. When Paladin sees that the gambler intends to cheat, he decides to help even the odds.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: After winning a batch of old rifles in a poker game, Paladin finds himself involved in a range war.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: A wealthy cattleman holds Paladin and two other men hostage. They will all die at dawn unless one of them admits to the murder of the rancher's wife.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: A retired colonel sends Paladin to a Nevada mining town to find out what happened to a woman.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: When Paladin finds a woman and her apparently typhoid-afflicted child abandoned by a wagonmaster, he enlists the aid of a doctor from a nearby town, but a religious fanatic then tries to bar them from entry.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Frank Callaway wins acquittal for a client and then escapes death at the hands of the two men who tried to frame his client. Sheriff Hollister captures the killer but no lawyer will accept the defense; so Callaway himself volunteers.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: The World's Fastest Gun,' Billy Denver, comes to Tombstone to perform. Challenged by Johnny's Pearce, he faces his first human target - and kills him. When Johnny's brother hears the news, he heads for Tombstone to avenge his brother's death.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Elias Ransome brings his band of religious emigrants to the outskirts of Tombstone, but a prejudiced rancher stirs up agitation against the newcomers, leading to an air of intolerance. Hollister and Clabourne must step in to resolve the situation.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: A gunslinger en route to Durango seeks Doc Holliday to gun him down for the murder of his brother. Passing through Tombstone, he becomes the enemy of two of the West's slickest draws -- Sheriff Hollister and the infamous dentist-turned-gunman.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: A handsome cowboy makes eyes at an immigrant miner's pretty daughter and upsets her staid European ideals. Betrothed by her father to a young miner, she forsakes him and her old-world traditions by leaving home to become an 'American lady.'

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: George and Patricia Camden, two people out of rancher Aaron McClain's shady past, blackmail him. Aided by a mysterious accomplice, McClain evens the score by murdering George, and Sheriff Hollister is plunged into a dangerous manhunt.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Old Man Clinton forces Bill Doolin - just out of prison - into an attempt to kill Sheriff Clay Hollister as Clay is the only witness against his two renegade sons. Dooline picks a fight with Clay who risks his life to get to the bottom of the plot.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Julie Dixon takes a job as a dealer in Tombstone's Saloon. Here, she deals a grim hand of vengeance. Her brother Sam, an incurable gambler, had killed Julie's lover six months before. She has taken the job as part of a plan to wreak revenge on Sam.

programme.desc: When a hot young filmmaker comes to Hollywood Arts, the kids are excited to work on his project. But when the film is released, and they aren't given credit, the kids turn to revenge.

programme.title: Victorious: Rex Dies
programme.desc: As the kids prepare for a big play, Rex is accidentally sucked into a giant fan and Tori is responsible. Robbie is an emotional wreck, and it's up to Tori to save the day by saving Rex's life.

programme.title: Victorious: The Diddly-Bops
programme.desc: Sikowitz recruits the gang to form a children's band for a friend's party. When a leaked video of the group's performance becomes popular, Andre struggles to be taken seriously as a musician.

programme.title: Victorious: Cat's New Boyfriend
programme.desc: Cat begins dating Tori's ex-boyfriend, Danny (Matt Angel) and Tori becomes jealous. Meanwhile, Trina convinces Robbie, Andre, Jade and Beck to indulge their feet in callus-eating fish that she's been buying from some stranger.

programme.title: Victorious: Sleepover at Sikowitz's
programme.desc: Sikowitz invites the gang to have a sleepover at his house in order to teach them a lesson in method acting.

programme.title: Victorious: The Wood
programme.desc: The kids are excited to hear that they'll be the stars of a new reality show being filmed at Hollywood Arts. Meanwhile, Trina and Robbie are forced to work at The Grub Truck after injuring Festus.

programme.title: Victorious: The Great Ping-Pong Scam
programme.desc: Tori discovers that her friends have been secretly going to a fancy restaurant instead of playing in an annual ping pong tournament.

programme.title: Victorious: Wok Star
programme.desc: Tori agrees to help Jade find a theater to perform a play Jade wrote. But when the sponsor demands changes that will ruin Jade's play, Tori has to make things right before opening night.

programme.title: Victorious: Survival of the Hottest
programme.desc: A heat wave hits LA and the gang heads for the beach in Beck's RV. But once there, they find themselves trapped inside the RV as the temperature rises. Oblivious, Cat parties it up with some cute boys.

programme.title: Victorious: Wi-Fi in the Sky
programme.desc: Tori's flight home is delayed, leaving her no time to finish a school project with her friends. She attempts to get the work done with them over video chat, but things keep getting in the way.

programme.title: Victorious: Beck Falls for Tori
programme.desc: Tori auditions for a role in a movie. But after exaggerating on her resume, she gets hired as a stunt double. When Tori finds out her stunt is falling off a building, she's not sure she can do it.

programme.title: Victorious: Helen Back Again
programme.desc: When Principal Eikner leaves Hollywood Arts, the school hires a new principal who makes all the students re-audition in order to keep their spots. Who will get kicked out?

programme.title: Victorious: Tori Gets Stuck
programme.desc: Tori Gets Stuck: Tori is excited when she gets cast as the lead in the school play, but she has to deal with her very unhappy understudy… Jade. Tori has to avoid Jade's constant sabotage so she can perform on opening night.

programme.title: Victorious: Tori Tortures Teacher
programme.desc: The kids take Sikowitz to the theater to celebrate his ten-year teaching anniversary, but the play's subject sends Sikowitz into a deep depression. Tori must cheer him up.

programme.title: Victorious: Jade Gets Crushed
programme.desc: Andre spends time with Jade working on a song and develops a crush on her. Tori tries to help him get over his crush, but nothing seems to work, and Andre has trouble keeping his feelings a secret.

programme.title: Victorious: Who Did it to Trina?
programme.desc: Trina stars in Tori's directorial debut, and there is a big accident on opening night. Lane wants to find out what went wrong. Everyone thinks it was an equipment malfunction, maybe it's sabotage.

programme.title: Victorious: Beggin' On Your Knees
programme.desc: Beggin' On Your Knees: The Full Moon Jam is coming up. The cutest boy in school wants to perform a duet with Tori, but she finds out he has a reputation. Is Tori just having trust issues, or is this guy bad news?

programme.title: Victorious: Ice Cream for Ke$ha
programme.desc: Tori has to be Trina's assistant for a month. The only way Trina will call off the bet is if Tori wins a private Ke$ha concert. Tori's friends try to save Tori and hopefully score a Ke$ha concert!

programme.title: Victorious: Prom Wrecker
programme.desc: Tori rallies the gang into having prom at Hollywood Arts, but the event ruins Jade's art project, and now she's out for revenge. Can Tori throw a successful prom, with Jade aiming to bring the whole dance down?

programme.title: Victorious: Terror on Cupcake Street
programme.desc: The kids have to build a float fast. They only have a night to drive the float to the parade. When the float breaks down in a bad neighborhood, can the kids recover and save their chance to be on TV?
